title.abbrev: PKIX: GOST R 34.10-2012 and GOST R 34.11-2012

front.title: Using GOST R 34.10-2012 and GOST R 34.11-2012 algorithms with the Internet X.509 Public Key Infrastructure
front.workgroup: Limited Additional Mechanisms for PKIX and SMIME

abstract.t: This document supplements RFC 3279 and RFC 4491. It describes encoding formats, identifiers, and parameter formats for the algorithms GOST R 34.10-2012 and GOST R 34.11-2012 for use in Internet X.509 Public Key Infrastructure (PKI).

section.title: Introduction
section.t: This document supplements . It describes the conventions for using the GOST R 34.10-2012 (see ) signature algorithms and GOST R 34.11-2012 (see ) one-way hash function in the Internet X.509 Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) .

This specification defines the contents of the signatureAlgorithm, signatureValue, signature, and subjectPublicKeyInfo fields within X.509 Certificates and CRLs. For each algorithm, the appropriate alternatives for the keyUsage certificate extension are provided.

section.title: Requirements Language
section.t: The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in .

section.title: Algorithm support
section.t: This sections describes one-way hash functions and digital signature algorithms that may be used to sign certificates and CRLs, identifies object identifiers (OIDs) and provides ASN.1 encoding for public keys contained in a certificate.
